Lenora Ellen Clark

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Eugenia Clark
  2. Foster Name: Lenora Majerus
  3. Foster Family: Theodore an Genevieve Majerus
  4. Foster Family Alt: Mageius
  5. Location of Family: Rulo, NE
  6. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  7. Arrival Place: Omaha, NE
  8. Age on Arrival: 1
  9. Date of Birth: 12/12/1920, New York City, NY
  10. Gender: female
  11. Married Name: Lenora (Lenora Lee) Campbell
  12. Spouse Name: Leo R. Campbell
  13. Source: Mary Ellen Johnson, comp., Orphan Train Riders: Their Own Stories vol. 1 (Baltimore: Gateway Press, 1992), P. 351-353; Crossroads May 1990, p.12; National Orphan Train Complex.
